title: Defensive Townie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Increase a player's permanent defense by 1.
- Decrease a player's permanent defense by 1. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- In order from lowest to highest, the order of defense is:
- Vulnerable, None, Basic, Powerful, Invincible, Overprotective, Immortal (death immune)
- If the host allows self-targeting, you can't increase your defense value higher than Powerful.

desc:
Post 2523
***Defense** is the best defense. Keep that in mind.*
